text:
So I did notice that my property ContactProperty was structured incorrectly which is fixed now.

Aside from that the only other difference is that yours is not a list. so yours is passed as
```{"properties": {"firstname": "Dennis","lastname": "Edson","email": "<mailto:nerds@gmail.com|nerds@gmail.com>"}}```
whereas mine is passed as

```{"properties": [{"firstname": "Dennis","lastname": "Edson","email": "<mailto:nerds@gmail.com|nerds@gmail.com>"}]}```
aside from that, did you notice anything else? does the api just not handle more than one creation of a contact at a time? I thought they had a capacity of 100 batch.
<@UQWGKUEN7> How did you add the "contact_signers" to the quote?

Hey Brett I donâ€™t think that I needed that. However if you hit the graphql endpoint for some quotes made in the hs app you can see all of the properties and add whatever is missing for the contact signers
It does but you need to use the batch api is you want to create in batches

Hello All,

I'm trying to send an email using a template but for some reason I keep getting a badRequest response when using POST/crm/v3/objects/emails.
`{"status":"error","message":"Invalid input JSON on line 1, column 3: Unexpected character ('-' (code 45)) in numeric value: expected digit (0-9) to follow minus sign, for valid numeric value","correlationId":"5c6bfee0-7095-47b1-a53e-0e0cb83d14cb"}`

I'm sending it the following JSON
`{"email_template_data":{"template_id":"41777488","contact_list":[{"email":"<mailto:david.goodman@test.com|david.goodman@test.com>","firstname":"david","lastname":" Goodman"}],"tokens":{"{FullAddress}":"101 m_mulberry ln","{AgentName}":"david"}}}`

I dont see a "-" in the fields so I'm a little confused about the response. Please let me know if this is something anyone has seen before.
